title: Unlocking the in vitro and in vivo antioxidant and anti-inflammatory activities of polysaccharide fractions from Lepidium sativum seed-coat mucilage
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Imdad Ullah Khan, Yusra Jamil, Fareeha Shams, Salman Farsi, Muhammad Humayun, Anwar Hussain, Ayaz Ahmad, Amjad Iqbal, Abdulwahed Fahad Alrefaei, Sajid Ali
